Upon getting the communication, Deadfur just keeps on wondering how
his wee=
k could go worse. An uprising and now a so-called Decepticon
attack. Pretty=
 sure he didn't want to know just how bad it could
really be, he decided to=
 take action.

Deadfur: All soldiers available, get to your posts! Man the =
turrets
and take that bogey down! Engineering, get me some shields up! Flie=
rs,
hit and run: I want him so harassed he won't know where we'll hit him
n=
ext.

The fusion blast took out an industrial complex near the edge of the
=
city. As a direct answer, volleys upon volleys of laser blasts flew at
Scor=
ponok's huge form, while formations of fliers scattered to offer
no unified=
 front.

*******

Jotunn: Airtankers, transform and fly out!

The five robo=
ts transformed into five different aircrafts, Motherload
being the largest,=
 a cargo ship with two side-turrets. Jotunn climbed
aboard her and ordered =
a formation of Predacon fliers to escort.

Jotunn: Our primary objective is=
 to take Relay as intact as possible.
Should that objective fail... sink th=
e city!

Motherload: Direct plan... no quarters asked... and things blow up=
.
Yup, I definitely like this! Airtankers, fly out! Let's show those
pansie=
s why we got "Tank" in our name!

The squadron and its escort left in the c=
old arctic winds for their
promised glory.
